sentences.sentence: Pressure must be uniformly distributed over the whole surface.
sentences.translation: 压力必须均匀分布于整个表面。

sentences.sentence: Nevertheless, the group took largely the same approach it did in 1999, uniformly discouraging passive media use, on any type of screen, for these kids.
sentences.translation: 然而，该组织采取了与1999年相似的方法，即，一致反对儿童接触被动媒体或接触任何类型的屏幕。
